txt.en: 'Wait, where is my cousin? Brogur?'
Instance: Flight from Khazad-dûm
'Fight them, fight them!'
'There he is!'
'But will it be enough?'
Brogur has been defeated, and you have failed!
Fight alongside Bósi as he retreats from Khazad-dûm
Talk to Bósi in the First Hall

'[placeholder]! The Iron Garrison is in disarray! Great tremors shook the city to its very foundations, and Orcs and goblins boiled from every crevice and chasm in the deep! I have never seen so many!\n\n'We were overcome! We have no choice but to escape, but Bósi and Brogur have not made it back yet! You have to find them!'
'[placeholder]! We have to fight them off for as long as we can! We need to give my cousin time to catch up to us!'
Find Brogur in the First Hall
'[placeholder], there is nothing we can do! We must retreat! Everyone, make for the East-gate!'
'Brogur, my cousin! How can it be? How can it be?\n\n'We have to leave, [placeholder]! We have to get out of here! The Iron Garrison has failed!'
Talk to Bósi in the First Hall
'Khazad-dûm is lost!'
You have found Brogur, but there is no sign of Bósi
If the rumours are true, the Iron Garrison is in danger and their foothold in Khazad-dûm is threatened.
Bósi is in the First Hall, near the East-gate of Khazad-dûm.
You have entered Khazad-dûm from the East-gate, and the situation appears worse than you feared.
DNT - Blah!
Brogur is on the western side of the First Hall.
Bósi and Brogur have not yet made it back to the East-gate. Solsi asked you to find them, if they still live.
'[placeholder] is here! King Thorin has sent help to us!'
DNT - Blah!
'Baruk Khazâd!'
Talk to Solsi inside the First Hall
Brogur fell behind during the retreat, and Bósi asked you to find his cousin.
Find Bósi and Brogur and escape from Khazad-dûm
Talk to Brogur in the First Hall
Defend Brogur in the First Hall
Bósi has been defeated, and you have failed!
Bósi has made it to the First Hall.
Fight alongside Bósi as he retreats from Khazad-dûm
Bósi has finally made it to the First Hall!
'[placeholder], Brogur has fallen behind! Can you find him?'
'Brogur!'
Defend Brogur in the First Hall
'The city is lost!'
'This way! We must reach the East-gate while we still can!'
You have found Brogur, but he is dead
